## Matrix4x4.multiplyRightAffine() method

Post-multiply by a matrix inplace, assuming both matrices present affine transformations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
multiplyRightAffine(other: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | The matrix that will be multiplied by. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)

self

## Remarks

this = this \* other
